short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add selected text to a to do list!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Click the browser icon to the right of the address bar to view your to do list
- Select text in the page before clicking the browser icon to add that text to the to do list
- To do list items are also hyperlinks to the pages they were originally selected from!
- Tick the checkbox next to a to do list item to delete it
- Works on any webpage besides Chromeâ€™s default pages, like the new tab page
- Works on any text except text in an iframe

by Marcella Park
special thanks to Peter Chang, Kevin Zhang, and James Lennon

This project is open source! Repo here: https://github.com/marcypark/select-yo-tasks
